privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Real Estate Referral Program - Dubai, UAE

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: Real Estate Referrer (hereinafter "we", "our" or "the Platform") is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of all users of our real estate referral platform.
intro.p2: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable laws in the United Arab Emirates.
intro.p3: By using our platform, you accept the practices described in this policy.

dataCollected.title: 1. Data Collected
dataCollected.intro: We collect different types of data to provide and improve our services:

personal.subtitle: 1.1 Personal Information
personal.p1: When you create a referrer account, we collect:

leads.subtitle: 1.2 Client Lead Data
leads.p1: When you submit a lead, we collect:

technical.subtitle: 1.3 Technical Data
technical.p1: We automatically collect certain technical information:

dataUsage.title: 2. Data Usage
dataUsage.intro: We use your personal data only for the following purposes:

purposes.subtitle: 2.1 Program Management
purposes.text: Create and manage your referrer account, track your leads and calculate your commissions.

purposes.subtitle: 2.2 Communication
purposes.text: Contact you regarding your leads, concluded sales, commission payments and important program updates.

purposes.subtitle: 2.3 Lead Processing
purposes.text: Contact potential clients you refer to us, organize viewings and negotiate real estate transactions.

purposes.subtitle: 2.4 Commission Payment
purposes.text: Calculate, verify and make payments of your referrer commissions.

purposes.subtitle: 2.5 Service Improvement
purposes.text: Analyze platform usage to improve our services and user experience.

purposes.subtitle: 2.6 Legal Compliance
purposes.text: Comply with our legal obligations, particularly those related to RERA regulations and UAE tax laws.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We never sell your personal data to third parties. We share your information only in the following cases:

cases.subtitle: 3.1 Lead Processing
cases.text: Information about clients you refer is shared with our sales team for lead processing and sales completion.

cases.subtitle: 3.2 Service Providers
cases.text: We may share certain data with trusted providers who help us deliver our services (hosting, payments, analytics). These providers are contractually bound to protect your data.

cases.subtitle: 3.3 Legal Obligations
cases.text: We may disclose your information if required by law, court decision or UAE government authority.

cases.subtitle: 3.4 Rights Protection
cases.text: In case of fraud, violation of terms of use or to protect our legal rights.

dataSharing.noSale: üîí We never sell, rent or trade your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.intro: We take the security of your data very seriously and implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:

measures.subtitle: 4.1 Encryption
measures.text: All sensitive data is encrypted in transit (HTTPS/SSL) and at rest.

measures.subtitle: 4.2 Secure Authentication
measures.text: Passwords are hashed with bcrypt. We use JWT tokens for secure sessions.

measures.subtitle: 4.3 Access Control
measures.text: Limited access to personal data, with role-based permissions (admin/referrer).

measures.subtitle: 4.4 Secure Hosting
measures.text: Our data is hosted on secure servers (Supabase/Vercel) with recognized security certifications.

measures.subtitle: 4.5 Monitoring
measures.text: Continuous access monitoring and detection of suspicious activities.

measures.subtitle: 4.6 Backups
measures.text: Regular and automatic backups of all data.

dataSecurity.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è No data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. While we make every effort to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
userRights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

rights.name: 5.1 Right of Access
rights.description: You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.

rights.name: 5.2 Right of Rectification
rights.description: You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.

rights.name: 5.3 Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten")
rights.description: You can request deletion of your personal data in certain cases. Note: we must retain certain data for legal or accounting reasons.

rights.name: 5.4 Right to Restriction of Processing
rights.description: You can request restriction of processing your data in certain circumstances.

rights.name: 5.5 Right to Data Portability
rights.description: You can receive your data in a structured and commonly used format.

rights.name: 5.6 Right to Object
rights.description: You can object to processing your data for direct marketing purposes.

rights.name: 5.7 Right to Withdraw Consent
rights.description: When processing is based on your consent, you can withdraw it at any time.

userRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@real-estate-referrer.com
userRights.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.intro: Our platform uses cookies and similar technologies:

types.name: 6.1 Essential Cookies
types.description: Necessary for platform operation (authentication, sessions, language preferences).

types.name: 6.2 Performance Cookies
types.description: Help us understand how users interact with the platform.

types.name: 6.3 LocalStorage
types.description: Used to save your language preference and some session data.

cookies.control: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect platform functionality.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:

periods.duration: As long as your account is active
5 years after transaction or lead closure
7 years (in accordance with UAE accounting and tax requirements)

dataRetention.deletion: After these periods, your data is deleted securely and irreversibly, unless a legal obligation requires us to retain it longer.

minors.title: 8. Protection of Minors
minors.text: Our platform is not intended for persons under 18 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If you believe a minor has provided personal information, contact us immediately.

international.title: 9. International Data Transfers
international.text: Your data is primarily stored and processed in the United Arab Emirates. Some of our service providers may be located in other countries (particularly the European Union and the United States). In this case, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with GDPR.

modifications.title: 10. Policy Modifications
modifications.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons.
modifications.p2: The "Last updated" date at the top of this page indicates when modifications were made.
modifications.p3: We encourage you to regularly review this policy to stay informed about how we protect your data.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.p1: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or exercising your rights, you can contact us:
contact.response: We are committed to responding to all your requests as soon as possible.
